com.tclee.tailog
Class Tailog

java.lang.Object
  com.tclee.tailog.Tailog

public class Tailog
extends Object

Simple implementation of the UNIX-like "tail -n" command.

Author:
Lee Tze Cheun

          Returns a string representing the last 10 lines of text from given file.

public static String tailog(String filename,
                            int nLines)
                     throws IOException
Returns a string representing the last N lines of text from given file.

Parameters:
filename - the filename of the file to tail
nLines - number of lines to be returned
Returns:
